archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0175
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be notified about the cost and package options for roaming when I leave NZ

properties.value: Do you expect Comarch to sent the cross boarder notifications? There is a Vodafone group system that probably will be used. To be verified by VF. There will need to be an integration (currently daily) - feed with customer prices. Parked for architecture discussion.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
